title: New & Video: Wilco – ‘Art of Almost' studio clip
body:
Earlier today don’t-even-mention-alt-country superstars **Wilco** posted up a video on their [website](http://wilcoworld.net/#!/ "Wilco Site") teasingly titled ‘Almost’, and even more teasingly taglined ‘Something new…’

For this particular follower of **Jeff Tweedy** and co, the two years since 2009’s excellent **_Wilco (The Album)_** have been long and torturous. So it’s nice to know that the mysteriously titled (or maybe not, as it turns out) ‘Almost’ video is actually a studio clip of the recording of the track _Art of Almost_, which opens the band’s forthcoming record **_The Whole Love_**, their eighth studio album to date.

**_The Whole Love_** will be available on 26th September, on **Wilco**‘s own dBpm label. A pre-order service and the album’s tracklist, amongst other things, can be found [here](http://wilcoworld.net/#!/music/the-whole-love "The Whole Love"). Meanwhile, here’s **Nels Cline** demonstrating that guitar freakouts can still be, like, way cool, and **Tweedy** ordering a Chinese, presumably…

(Photo © Zoran Orlic 2011)
